description: Square array T(n, k) read by antidiagonals upwards, n > 0 and k > 0: for any number n > 0, let f(n) be the polynomial of a single indeterminate x where the coefficient of x^e is the prime(1+e)-adic valuation of n (where prime(k) denotes the k-th prime); f establishes a bijection between the positive numbers and the polynomials of a single indeterminate x with nonnegative integer coefficients; let g be the inverse of f; T(n, k) = g(f(n) o f(k)) (where o denotes function composition).
